nodes.bodyText: I changed it to 10s but it has been the source for couple failed runs today. Making timeOut bigger.
I think containsText is a better name. :)
Unused because no more Invitation Key.
I skipped clone and create workspaces tests for the PR. I will undo skip first then merge to master.
The AoU logo is visible on signed out/account creation pages as well
you're correctly. I updated signedInIndicator  to be app-signed-in.
will it be ok if the request will happen in any order?
yes. what matters is that they're all present.
